main.name: Leo Kalshteyn
main.bio: Experienced in Ruby on Rails and JavaScript based programming with a background in IT hardware installation. Broadly knowledgeable in the latest web technologies as well as principles and techniques in app development. Possess strong skills in conveying technical information and learning new concepts.

education.description: Full Stack Web Development, Ruby on Rails and JavaScript online program.

work.title: Web Developer, Intern
work.description: Worked with WordPress and Divi in drafting and refining non-profitable site

work.title: Technician
work.description: Installing, configuring and supporting of wired/wireless survelliance equipment, including Network Video Recorders (NVR), IP cameras (IPC), Wi-Fi access points (AP) and associated network cabling.

work.title: Technician
work.description: Installed, serviced and troubleshot HVAC equipment including control modules, actuators, temperature/pressure sensors and other measuring devices, circulating pumps, and various fans. Control, adjustment, and operational checks of components to assure reliability.

work.title: Web Developer/Technician
work.description: Designed, created, managed company's website including product listings for the entire merchandise library. Designed and installed proprietary LED-based illumination system for main Manhattan storefront.

projects.title: Museum Manager
projects.category: This app allows you to take the role of a museum manager where you can add, track and manage exhibits.

projects.title: Book Library
projects.category: A Sinatra App to keep track of books, their authors and which users posted them.

projects.title: Planet Database
projects.category: This is an app that lets you add planets(specifically exo planets) to known star systems. This is a single page application with the Frontend built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript and a backend with ruby on rails.

projects.title: Quiz Buzz - Computer Science Edition
projects.category: A react app that allows the user to test their computer science knowledge with true or false questions.

projects.title: Blood Bowl 2 Teams
projects.category: This is an app that lets you browse all of the teams, players and star players that exist in the game Blood Bowl 2 along with their unique stats and information.
